website_summaries.verdict: An easy to use topical gel to quickly relieve pain without the wait.
pros: Comes in an easy-to-use, mess-free tube
Great for users constantly on the go
Can be used safely throughout the day without skin irritation or clothes staining
cons: Active users will likely have to apply repeatedly to manage pain

customer_reviews.title: Best topical pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: Stop Pain is by far the best topical product I have found for pain and muscle aches. It has more active ingredients than BioFreeze and works better in my opinion. The gel form allows for a generous amount to be applied to the area.
customer_reviews.author: James Noe

customer_reviews.title: Appears used and has been totally trashed.  AMZ won't accept return
customer_reviews.text: Interior package destroyed and NOT SEALED. Health and safety issue. Never use a product that has been opened. Appears to have been tampered with as well. Why isn't it returnable?
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Like BioFreeze but better smell and effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: This product comes in gel and roll on. I got both and each is useful depending on where it is applied. Non greasy. Not a heavy smell, either. Used to get BioFreeze at chiropractic office, but this is available and a stronger/more effective formulation for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Helps my knee & sholder feel better
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman cattle rancher. I do stuff that makes my body hurt. Stop pain helps me feel better. I use a rubber glove to apply this. I tried the spray but prefer the rub on. The smell is a bit much but it's worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Emily Blum

customer_reviews.title: Great pain reliver.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best over the counter pain reliver I have used. Also, this is the same item used by my Physical Therapist.
customer_reviews.author: J. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Depending on your pain level it may or may not give you the relief you need.
customer_reviews.text: I felt no different using this product than I did the ones I purchased elsewhere. I won’t purchase again. Everything does not work for everyone and this one did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vernatha A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: PAIN
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKED ON NECK AND KNEE PAIN BUT UNABLE TO USE FOR BACK BECAUSE I COULD NOT REACH AREA I NEEDED. RECOMMEND HIGHLY FOR NECK AND KNEE BH
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Relieves the pain.
customer_reviews.text: This gel has more menthol than other products, and I think that's what helps me. I use a special dispenser with a long handle to apply it on my back, and this gel has just the right consistency to flow through the small openings. I have tried some other gels, but they are too thick. So glad I found this online as the local stores don't carry it anymore. It definitely helps the pain.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and easy
customer_reviews.text: I rub some on my shoulders in the morning. Warm comfortable feeling
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Maddocks

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and this product is fantastic for today type of pain, or arthritis, or muscle pain! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: CS Mobley

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: takes the pain away in a little bit but stays away for hours.
customer_reviews.author: The Consultant

customer_reviews.title: I didn't feel any improvement in using this product, ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel any improvement in using this product, it sure didn't stop my pain. I wouldn't' buy this item again
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G.Odom

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain reduction and numbing!
customer_reviews.text: Great for pain reduction and numbing. Very effective, and the smell is really strong.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago G.

customer_reviews.title: Product works
customer_reviews.text: My friend I gave to in phillipines said product really worked very happy
customer_reviews.author: Frank Carter

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my wife and she said it was super. She uses it every night on her shoulder ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she said it was super. She uses it every night on her shoulder and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have used stoppain for years but had never heard of the gel until someone brought me some. I really prefer it now. One only needs a small amount and can apply directly where the pain is - mine happens to be the neck and head area. Great product
customer_reviews.author: dotstewart

customer_reviews.title: It's not genuine
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even open the box, box looks like it's been tampered with. Scotch tape closing it. Not comfortable using it.
customer_reviews.author: Despina

customer_reviews.title: Works great on back and knee pain.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to use on my foot arch and it helped considerably. I gave it to my mom who has a bad back and knee and she said it helps with her pain alot.
customer_reviews.author: Norm E.

customer_reviews.title: Sore elbow resolved.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would ease the pain in my elbow and was not disappointed. Relief was faster than I was expecting. Some oder but worth it to get rid of the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Well, I'd love it more if the pain went away longer but the menthol applied to the surface of the skin overrides some of the deeper pain,which I appreciate lots!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Dinae

customer_reviews.title: My clients love this stuff better than BioFreeze.
customer_reviews.text: My clients love this stuff better than BioFreeze. I use the tube for samples and sell the roll-on.
customer_reviews.author: machellephillips

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Buck up for Blue. It’s better and more value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: NadiaNaNa

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Heats up and lasts a long time. Much more reasonably priced than buying over the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Carl & Becky Ham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pain relief products on the market.
customer_reviews.author: BigAl

customer_reviews.title: Relief is excellent, but short lived.
customer_reviews.text: Using it for severe arthritic knee pain. It works for about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked as Expected
customer_reviews.text: After many years of using the spray and roll on versions of this product, I decided to try the gel. As expected, the Stopain gel worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Valent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great for your hands, you can use it like a lotion for overnight relief.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C Garcia

product_meta.title: Stopain Extra Strength Gel Tube 4 fl. oz. Non-Greasy Relief for Muscle and Joint Pain
product_meta.description: Stopain Extra Strength Pain Relieving Gel with 8% menthol works on contact to provide immediate, penetrating relief from arthritis, muscle aches, joint and back pain. It is formulated with added dimethyl sulfone (MSM) and glucosamine to support joint health and mobility. Roll directly onto affected area without the need to rub, massage or bandage. Repeat as necessary, but do not apply more than 4 times daily. Not for children 12 years or younger.
feature_bullets: STOPS PAIN & SUPPORTS BETTER MOBILITY: Stopain Extra Strength Pain Relief Spray includes MSM & glucosamine to help reduce joint pain & arthritis pain and to support joint flexibility & joint mobility.

PAIN RELIEF GEL: Rub on mess-free pain relief with Stopain. Relieve the pain of aching, sore muscles, joints & feet without heat or ice. Try Stopain for back pain, knee pain, joint pain & arthritis pain.

SAFE & EFFECTIVE: Stopain uses menthol to offer real-time temporary relief for simple backache, arthritis, strains, bruises & sprains. Our extra strength products help support joint health & mobility.
TOPICAL PAIN RELIEF: Stopain carries pain relief topicals, roll-ons, sprays & gels. Whether suffering from the pain of a migraine or living with arthritis or joint pain, Stopain may offer relief.

STOPAIN STOPS THE PAIN: The next time you're in pain, reach for Stopain's pain relieving spray, gel or roll-on. Real-time pain relief for knee pain, arthritis pain, back pain, neuropathy, and fibromyalgia.
